Notes: Chains into 5LP/2LP/2LK; high active frame count makes it a useful meaty (up to 8/1); SA2 cancel: 8/1; DR cancel is delayed until after 3rd active frame
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; DR cancel is delayed until after 3rd active frame

Strong combo/pressure starter and meaty tool, especially out of Drive Rush to minimize pushback; meaty timing can be up to 10/5; SA2 cancel: 14/9; special/DR cancel is delayed until after 2nd active frame
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; 2f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into; special/DR cancel is delayed until after 2nd active frame
Forces stand on hit; good whiff punish tool with long range; large hurtbox makes it weak as an anti-air; SA2 cancel: 18/14
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); forces stand on hit; maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; 1f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into
Good range for a light normal, but can't combo into 214MK; SA2 cancel: 5/0; special cancel is delayed until after 2nd active frame
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; special cancel is delayed until after 2nd active frame

8f startup for 2nd hit only; 1st hit can combo from 5LP and has enough hitstun to combo to 214HK for a launch and Fuha stock; great poke in neutral (1st hit can interrupt opponent's button while 2nd hit extends for long range); very effective when used out of Drive Rush; SA2 cancel: 19/7 (1st hit)

Chained version during SA2 (FSE); 1st hit has 4f less hitstun (cannot combo into 214HK); when chained into, 4f shorter hitconfirm window (2f if 2nd hit only); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents

Not airborne despite the animation; long range and safe on block with a follow-up juggle on Punish Counter makes it great in neutral; better frame advantage when well spaced (very difficult to connect with the final active frame)

Becomes fully cancelable during FSE, even when not chained into; not airborne despite the animation; maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; 2f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into; special/DR cancel is delayed until after 5th recovery frame
Chains into 5LP/2LP/2LK; SA2 cancel: 7/2; DR cancel is delayed until after 2nd active frame
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; DR cancel is delayed until after 2nd active frame
Good combo tool and useful when buffered in neutral; good anti-air for horizontal approaches (hitbox is above her extended fist); SA2 cancel: 15/8
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; 2f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into

Forces stand on hit; great anti-air but cannot hit cross-up (upward leg hurtbox is anti-air invincible on frames 8-15); all active frames are cancelable; powerful combo starter after a canceled Drive Rush hitconfirm; SA2 cancel: 22/8
Chained version of 2HP during SA2 (FSE); jump cancelable on hit only; when jump canceled, FSE air normals cause juggle state; 2f shorter CHAIN react window when chained into
Chains into 5LP/2LP/2LK; becomes fully cancelable during Feng Shui Engine
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); 2f shorter special hitconfirm window when chained into; maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents
Excellent range for a cancelable low poke in neutral; SA2 cancel: 15/8; Range: 1.517 (1st frame: 1.446); DR cancel is delayed until after active frames

Chained version during SA2 (FSE); 1f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into; maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; Range: 1.517 (1st frame: 1.446); DR cancel is delayed until after active frames
Not a Hard Knockdown when juggled into (requires free juggle state or Drive Rush 2HK); becomes fully cancelable during Feng Shui Engine (even when not chained into)
Chained version of 2HP during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; 4f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into
During FSE forward jump, can cancel into divekick
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents

Puts airborne opponents into limited juggle state; cancelable into divekick; instant j.MP > j.214KK is a useful option against corner throw loops (much less punishable than a blocked reversal); can only be used as a fuzzy instant overhead if the opponent is in Burnout and blocks a deep j.HK
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents
Cross-up; causes a spike knockdown vs. airborne opponents with no Hard Knockdown; better KD Adv. when hitting lower to the ground; during FSE forward jump, can cancel into divekick
Chained version during SA2 (FSE)
Cross-up; can be used as a fuzzy instant overhead; during FSE forward jump, can cancel into divekick
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents
Cross-up; during FSE forward jump, can cancel into divekick
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents
During FSE forward jump, can cancel into divekick; shifts Juri's hurtbox upward during startup
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents

Hits on both sides (can cross-up if opponent tries to move underneath Juri); can be used as an air-to-air; when chained after FSE nj.MP, puts airborne opponents into juggle state; shifts Juri's hurtbox upward during startup
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents
SA2 cancel: 16/9
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); 2f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into; maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents
Not airborne despite the animation; 2 extra recovery frames on whiff

Chained Feng Shui Engine version; not airborne despite the animation; the special/chain cancel window only applies when chaining into 6MK and the KD doesn't allow anything to juggle on hit; 2 extra recovery frames on whiff; special/DR cancel is delayed until after 2nd active frame

Both hits are cancelable; 23f startup for 2nd hit only; 1st hit has more hitstun and blockstun for cancels; both hits put airborne opponent into limited juggle state; carries counter-hit/Punish Counter advantage through both hits; SA2 cancel: 18/8 (1st hit), 17/11 (2nd hit)
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); maintains juggle state vs. airborne opponents; 4f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into

Both hits are cancelable; 1st hit forces stand and puts airborne opponents into limited juggle state; 2nd hit causes spike knockdown vs. airborne opponents; 19f startup for 2nd hit only; carries counter-hit/Punish Counter advantage through both hits; SA2 cancel: 12/6 (1st hit), 12/8 (2nd hit)
Chained version during SA2 (FSE); both hits knock down; 8f shorter hitconfirm window when chained into
Safe Target Combo starter that leaves ample time to confirm the final hit; 4HP cannot be delayed to create a blockstring gap
(refers to scaled damage); not airborne despite the animation; if HP is delayed to final possible frame, creates a 1f blockstring gap from 4HP
Has access to corner throw loops by dashing (3)
No throw oki after back throwing opponent into corner, but can use meaty strikes
KD Adv. varies based on height (lower height = worse advantage); switches sides; no oki after throwing opponent back into the corner
See Drive Impact. Airborne connect gives spinning juggle state on Punish Counter or corner Wall Splat with variable height.
5f extra recovery on hit; see Drive Reversal.
See Drive Parry. Perfect Parrying has only 1F of recovery and disables the opponent from canceling their attack. Perfect Parrying projectiles puts you into fixed 11 frames of recovery.
See Drive Rush. Frame data shown in parentheses refers to the Drive Rush version used from a Parry. Distance: 0.641 (min/throw), 2.479 (min/block), 3.999 (max/final DR frame)

Gains 1 Fuha stock on hit/block/whiff on frame 10; 1-hit projectile clash hitbox on frames 8-13; puts opponent into limited juggle state (only combos into SA3); does not move forward during startup; 2f extra recovery on whiff

Gains 1 Fuha stock on hit/block/whiff on frame 13; 1-hit projectile clash hitbox on frames 11-16; puts opponent into limited juggle state (only combos into SA3); takes small step forward, making it more consistent in combos (but does not combo naturally from 5LK)

Gains 1 Fuha stock on hit/block/whiff on frame 25; 1-hit projectile clash hitbox on frames 23-28; launches opponent high into a limited juggle state; takes large step forward (but only combos naturally from 5HP, 2HP, and first hit of 5MK and 6HP); 2f extra recovery on block

Gains 1 Fuha stock on hit/block/whiff on frame 16; 2-hit OD projectile clash hitbox on frames 14-19; launches opponent high into a limited juggle state; takes small step forward (consistent like the MK version, but does not combo naturally from light normals); SA2 cancel: KD51/-6
1-hit projectile hitbox (can lose to projectile-invuln moves); very short range
1-hit projectile; costs 1 Fuha stock; can press MK or HK to cancel into other 236K specials for 1 Fuha stock (within the first 3 active frames)
2-hit OD projectile; only the 2nd hit knocks down; can press MK or HK to cancel into other OD 236K specials for 1 Fuha stock and 1 Drive bar; SA2 cancel: KD57/17
8-27f low crush; KD vs. airborne opponents
Costs 1 Fuha stock; 8-27f low crush; KD vs. airborne opponents; can press LK or HK to cancel into other 236K specials for 1 Fuha stock
8-27f low crush; OTG bounce vs. airborne opponents (limited juggle state); pressing LK or HK cancels to other OD 236K specials for 1 Fuha stock  1 Drive bar; SA2 cancel: 16/-3
Puts airborne opponents into limited juggle state (only high airborne connect launches high enough for follow-up juggle besides SA3 cancel); good juggle ender for damage when canceling to SA3

All 3 hits are Super cancelable; first hit keeps opponent grounded, 2nd and 3rd hits put opponent into limited juggle state; can press LK or MK to cancel any hit into other OD 236K specials for 1 Fuha stock and 1 Drive bar; SA2 cancel: 17/17 (1st hit), KD54/15 (2nd hit), KD52/4 (3rd hit); 3rd hit cannot juggle into held SA2 dash attack
Both hits are SA3 cancelable; not airborne; fairly consistent combo ender
Strong anti-air but cannot hit cross-up; slightly less horizontal range than 623HP
Only 1 hit connects vs. crouch block (4f worse oB, less chip damage); strong combo ender and anti-air but cannot hit cross-up; slightly more horizontal range than 623MP
Juri's primary reversal option; final attack comes out on hit only; cannot hit cross-up
During forward jump only; can input follow-up on hit only; puts opponent into limited juggle state (lower connect allows better follow-up juggles); button strength does not affect trajectory

Comes out on hit only; can delay the input to get better KD Advantage; no follow-up after juggle state; Juri is in a crouching state during landing recovery; total recovery time before landing varies by juggle height
During forward jump only; can input follow-up on hit only; puts opponent into limited juggle state

Puts opponent into limited juggle state; comes out on hit only; can delay the input to get better juggle follow-ups and better KD Adv.; Juri is in a crouching state during landing recovery; total recovery time before landing varies by juggle height

Costs 1 Fuha stock; both hits are Super cancelable; can press LK or MK to cancel into other 236K specials for 1 Fuha stock; puts opponent into limited juggle state (only airborne hit launches high enough for follow-up juggle besides SA3 cancel); good for damage when comboing into SA3
Projectile hitbox; active frames and KD Adv. are highly variable based on screen position; Full Dmg distribution: 200x4,300,700
Projectile hitbox; requires one Fuha stock to use (consumes this stock); active frames and KD Adv. are highly variable based on screen position; Full Dmg distribution: 200x4,300,1200

Lasts 600 frames (10 seconds); timer stops counting down during attack hit/block freeze; allows Juri to chain into normals of equal or ascending strength (cannot chain back into the same attack); chains change the properties of certain moves (6MK and Heavy normals become knockdowns); 5HK/2LK/2HK/6MK become cancelable

Holding the button performs a dash attack; puts airborne opponents into free juggle state or maintains existing juggle state; can cancel on hit/block into any normal; afterwards, has same properties as regular Feng Shui Engine activation; dash attack cannot hit cross-up
Cinematic time regenerates ~2 Drive bars for Juri
Available at 25% HP or below; cinematic time regenerates ~2.4 Drive bars for Juri
